resources.string: "The client attempted to call a method from an API that failed to connect.
This app is misconfigured. Have the dev take a look at the logs on their end, specifically their Google Play stuff
Operation failed with no detailed information
An internal/network error occurred. Retrying should fix things
Client attempted to connect with an invalid account name specified
Timed out while waiting for result…
An unspecified error has occurred… Error Code:
